message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Every round costs you money.
I'm willing to be generous, Alice, but let's make it fair for both of us. This offer still leaves you with the lion's share.
This is a serious offer, Bob.  The clock is ticking and it's costing you.
Okay, Alice, I'm coming closer to your terms, but this has to be a two-way street.  Time is running out for both of us.
Time to be realistic, Bob. This is a good deal before inflation eats away at your share even more.
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
Okay, Bob.  Last chance. This is a good deal more than the 50/50 you'll be lucky to get in a few more rounds.
